page.title: 19RELIGION
page.content: There is a great variety of Religious belief in both the Southbourne area and in Britain today. Types of Christianity abound - the area has several churches,but regular church attendance has declined.People are no longer afraid to question religion.An increasing number of parents do not have their children baptised,preferring to leave religion to school and the child's own inclination. There has been an increase in knowledge of other faiths,largely brought about by the growth of multi- racial communities in our cities. Strangely,our area has very few immigrants or coloured peoples. Alongside scepticism threr is a growing interest in related fields such as the paranormal and life after death.
